refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: SSL_get_extms_support() indicates whether the current session used extended master secret.
This function is implemented as a macro.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: SSL_get_extms_support() returns 1 if the current session used extended master secret, 0 if it did not and -1 if a handshake is currently in progress i.e. it is not possible to determine if extended master secret was used.
